# tricobbler

The word `tricobbler` comes from a Chinese proverb emphasizing that
collaboration among ordinary people can surpass the intelligence of a
single genius.

> Three cobblers with their wits combined equal `Zhuge Liang`
>
> 三个臭皮匠，顶个诸葛亮

The goal of `tricobbler` is to combine a

## Installation

You can install the development version of tricobbler like so:

``` r
# FILL THIS IN! HOW CAN PEOPLE INSTALL YOUR DEV PACKAGE?
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(tricobbler)
## basic example code
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`Agent()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/Agent.md) : Agent
  Function Wrapper for State Execution

- [`AgentContext`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/AgentContext.md)
  : Execution Context for Workflow State Management

- [`AgentRuntime`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/AgentRuntime.md)
  : Agent Runtime Environment for State Execution

- [`AsyncScheduler`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/AsyncScheduler.md)
  :

  `Async` Workflow Execution Scheduler

- [`AttachmentIndex`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/AttachmentIndex.md)
  : Attachment Index for Workflow Result Tracking

- [`Manifest()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/Manifest.md) :
  Validated Container Linking Master Policy to State Policies

- [`MasterPolicy()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/MasterPolicy.md)
  : Master Workflow Policy Defining Stages and Version

- [`Scheduler`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/Scheduler.md) :
  Synchronous Workflow Scheduler

- [`Skill`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/Skill.md) : Skill:
  Load and Serve Skill Directories

- [`StatePolicy()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/StatePolicy.md)
  : State-Level Policy Implementation for Workflow Stages

- [`as_agent()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/as_agent.md) :
  Convert Objects to Agent

- [`docopt()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/docopt.md) :
  Parse Command-Line Arguments with Enhanced Error Messages

- [`manifest_write()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/manifest-file.md)
  [`manifest_read()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/manifest-file.md)
  : Read or Write Manifest from or to a YAML File

- [`map_type_to_ellmer()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/map_type_to_ellmer.md)
  :

  Convert Type Definitions to ellmer Type Indicators

- [`mcp_attach()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcp_attach.md)
  : Attach Context to Chat Messages

- [`mcp_describe()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcp_describe.md)
  :

  Describe an R object for use in `MCP` tools

- [`mcptool_build()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcptool_build.md)
  :

  Build `MCP` Tool Definitions from Package Documentation

- [`mcptool_instantiate()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcptool_instantiate.md)
  :

  Instantiate from RAVE `MCP` tool definition

- [`mcptool_list()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcptool_list.md)
  :

  List `MCP` tool names from a package or directory

- [`mcptool_load_all()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcptool_load_all.md)
  :

  Load `MCP` Tool Definitions from Package or Directory

- [`mcptool_path()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcptool_path.md)
  :

  Find path to a specific `MCP` tool by name

- [`mcptool_read()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcptool_read.md)
  :

  Read `MCP` tool definition from `YAML` file

- [`mcptool_write()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/mcptool_write.md)
  :

  Write `MCP` tool definition to file

- [`sandboxed_read_file()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/sandboxed-tools.md)
  [`sandboxed_load_text()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/sandboxed-tools.md)
  [`sandboxed_write_file()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/sandboxed-tools.md)
  [`sandboxed_walk_directory()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/sandboxed-tools.md)
  [`sandboxed_copy_file()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/sandboxed-tools.md)
  [`sandboxed_tools()`](http://dipterix.org/tricobbler/reference/sandboxed-tools.md)
  : Create file I/O tools in sand-box
